name: Fantasy Earth: Zero
description:
Fantasy Earth: Zero is a RPG massively multiplayer game developed by Square Enix. It was originally released in 2006. It was published by Gamepot. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Fantasy Earth: Zero on PC.
It was scored by Chronicles:, Hidenori Iwasaki, Hitoshi Sakimoto and Kenichi Koyano.
